com.ibm.mobile.services.push

Class IBMPushBroadcastReceiver

  • java.lang.Object
    • WakefulBroadcastReceiver
      • com.ibm.mobile.services.push.IBMPushBroadcastReceiver

  • public class IBMPushBroadcastReceiver
extends WakefulBroadcastReceiver
    IBMPushBroadcastReceiver receives GCM messages and delivers them to com.ibm.mobile.services.push.IBMPushIntentService. The class should be configured as the broadcast receiver in AndroidManifest.xml of the android application. 
     
     For example, 
    
 <application> 
 ....
  	<receiver android:name="com.ibm.mobile.services.push.IBMPushBroadcastReceiver" 
  		android:permission="com.google.android.c2dm.permission.SEND">
 			<intent-filter>
 				<action android:name="com.google.android.c2dm.intent.RECEIVE" /> 
 				<category android:name="<package name of android application>" /> 
 			</intent-filter>
 			<intent-filter>
				<action android:name="android.intent.action.BOOT_COMPLETED" />
				<category android:name="<package name of android application>" />
			</intent-filter>	
 		</receiver>
 ...
 </application>
